name: Bumper Block
description: A bumper block that can move in different patterns and starts at a specified position.

fields.name: Start Position
fields.description: Defines the starting position of the bumper block.

fields.name: Movement Type
fields.description: Defines the movement pattern of the bumper block.

0.name: Spins in place
0.description: The bumper block spins in place.

1.name: Moves from west to east
1.description: The bumper block moves from west to east.

2.name: Moves in a small circle
2.description: The bumper block moves in a small circular pattern.

3.name: Moves in a circle
3.description: The bumper block moves in a circular pattern.

4.name: Moves in a big circle
4.description: The bumper block moves in a large circular pattern.
